Reviews.Title: Great LG product
Reviews.Author: steve
Reviews.Content: Lots of good features on a basic phone. Easy to use and long battery life.bought for non smartphone user and has worked out great.

Reviews.Title: Simple & Reliable
Reviews.Author: Al
Reviews.Content: I don't need anything fancy, just something to make a few calls and send the occasional text.  This LG A270 phone is exactly what I was looking for.  It's small, simple, durable, and has much better reception than my previous phone.  The built-in LED flashlight is pretty useful too.  I'm very happy with this product.

ProductInfo.Name: LG A270 Black Unlocked GSM QuadBand Mp3 Cell Phone
